item.title: Help :S
item.dc:creator: @Kar0liuxz Kar0liuxz
item.description:
@Kar0liuxz wrote:

so i got these voids :

public void clueorreward() { int clueorreward = misc.random(3); if(clueorreward == 0) { nextclue(); } else if(clueorreward == 1) { nextclue(); } else if(clueorreward == 2) { reward(); } } public void nextclue() { int nextclue2 = misc.random(15); if(nextclue2 == 0) { addItem(2837,1); } else if(nextclue2 == 1) { addItem(2839,1); } else if(nextclue2 == 2) { addItem(2841,1); } else if(nextclue2 == 3) { addItem(2843,1); } else if(nextclue2 == 4) { addItem(2845,1); } else if(nextclue2 == 5) { addItem(2851,1); } else if(nextclue2 == 6) { addItem(2853,1); } else if(nextclue2 == 7) { addItem(2855,1); } else if(nextclue2 == 8) { addItem(2856,1); } else if(nextclue2 == 9) { addItem(2857,1); } else if(nextclue2 == 10) { addItem(2858,1); } else if(nextclue2 == 11) { addItem(3506,1); } else if(nextclue2 == 12) { addItem(3507,1); } else if(nextclue2 == 13) { addItem(3508,1); } else if(nextclue2 == 14) { addItem(3509,1); } }

if(c.playerHasItem(2841, 1)){ if(c.absX >= 3211 && c.absX <= 3211 && c.absY >= 3214 && c.absY <=3214){ c.startAnimation(2843); c.updateRequired = true; c.appearanceUpdateRequired = true; c.clueorreward(); c.deleteItem(2841, c.GetItemSlot(2841), 1); c.sM("You find another clue!"); } }

but the clue just gets deleted and i dont get a second one :S whats wrong?

Read full topic
